name: EXAM LISTS
description:
When studying for my qualifying exams in 2018, I created a Twine story in order to organize my reading notes. This resulted in a  database-like structure that I've continued to  use as a means of referencing my readings in both my research and pedagogy. For anyone looking to organize their own reading notes, I highly recommend creating a similar project, and I offer my own here as a potential model.

These files, created through Twine, are published here. Through the database "game" above, you can navigate the front-end of my reading notes in order to get an idea of how they're organized and connected.
